name: Rimin Air ATO
about: Rimin Air Ltd., based in Shtip, North Macedonia, is a family-run Approved Training Organisation (ATO) approved by the Civil Aviation Authority of North Macedonia (MKD.ATO.001) in accordance with Part-FCL regulations (EASA). Established in June 2019, Rimin Air offers a range of flight training programs, including Light Aircraft Pilot Licence (LAPL(A)), Private Pilot Licence (PPL(A)), and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL(A)). Additional ratings include Single Engine Piston class rating, Night VFR rating, Flight Instructor rating, and sailplane and banner towing ratings. The school also provides ICAO/EASA English language proficiency exams. With a professional and friendly approach, Rimin Air is dedicated to turning aviation enthusiasts into skilled aviators, ensuring a comprehensive and supportive learning environment for all students. Ready to take flight, Rimin Air is your gateway to a thrilling aviation journey.
services:
["Light Aircraft Pilot Licence - LAPL(A)
Private Pilot Licence - PPL(A)
Commercial Pilot Licence - CPL(A)
Flight Instructor rating - FI(A)
Single engine aircraft rating/Land - SEP(A)/Land
Multi engine aircraft rating - MEP
Night VFR rating - NVFR
Sailplane and Banner towing rating - TOW(S) or TOW(B)"]
